definition: postnatal period/puerperium (period of six weeks after childbirth)
a period of time/phase/stage/classifier for issues of a periodical, courses of study/time/term/period/to hope/Taiwan pr. [qi2]

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the effect of home follow-up to the quality of life of primiparas during puerperium.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討家庭探訪對初產婦產褥期生活質量的影響。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the clinical characteristic of puerperal mental disorder.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討產褥期首發精神障礙臨牀特點。

sentences.english: Because or infects repeatedly in the puerperal period, causes involution of uterus not to cause.
sentences.chinese: 或者因在產褥期反覆感染，致使子宮復舊不全引起。
